summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2104, for the improvement of West 67th Street, from 8th Avenue Northwest to 14th Avenue Northwest, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks and wooden cross walks and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 21198 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
